ScryScreen2.synopsis: A cinematic, showing the second scrying screens on the wall of the security office in the Steel Watch Foundry. The camera should zoom in on the screen, and help convey the information.
ScryScreen2.how_to_trigger: Go to -325; 10; -147 and click on the S_LOW_ScryScreen02_1d221b28-9a9b-482a-9ef0-4e65a0e60bc7

PAD_ReadGondBook.synopsis: A PAD reacting to finding the true name of Gond in a book. This PAD only triggers if the palyer knows that the true name of Gond can destroy the Neurocitor.
PAD_ReadGondBook.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aturn on peace mode to avoid unnecessary fightsGo to -331; 6; -145Kill Zanner ToobinRead the book in his pocket.Go to -1935; 0; 441Search the nearby bookshelves for the Gond lore book.read it, and obesever the PAD afterwards.

GondianWorker02.synopsis: The different states for a Gondian in the foundry. In this dialogue Frell can be - terrified and working on a watcher under the watchful gaze of an overseers, post fight with said overseers, post the iron throne exploding (doesn't know if his wife is safe or not), and alone now that toobin (his leader) has been killed and he's freaking out about how to remove his collar/leave the foundry.

AD_DrooCleaningUp.synopsis: Droo Falbo worriedly mutters to himself angrily as he cleans up the dead bodies of his captors. He knows he has to move fast or risk getting caught.

DeadMansSwitchThreat.synopsis: The Banite guards demonstrate the power the dead man's switches hold over their prisoners.This interaction is fully between NPCs, the player is not shown at all (as the player might be sneaking and be close, or might be watching from afar.)
DeadMansSwitchThreat.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -267; 6; -148 / -300.224; 14.242; -167.023Approach the center of the room.The dialog should start automatically.

AD_ChattingBaneites.synopsis: Two banites stand near just inside the steel foundry, near the entrance.

AD_DrooWorkingHard.synopsis: Droo Falbo is working on a steel watcher. He is falling alseep on his feet.

AD_LowaCleaningUp.synopsis: Lowa worriedly mutters to herself as she is cleaning up the remains of the Baneites after the fight on the ground floor. She knows she has to do everything she can to hide all the evidence, or she and her son will be killed. She is doing her best to treat it like a math equartion - something to be solved.

GondianWorker03.synopsis: The different states for a Gondian in the foundry. In this dialogue Frell can be - terrified and working on a watcher under the watchful gaze of an overseers, post fight with said overseers, post the iron throne exploding (doesn't know if his mother is safe or not), and alone now that toobin (his leader) has been killed and he doesn't know what to do.

PAD_ReadZannerBook.synopsis: A PAD spoken by the player character when they finish reading Zanner Toobin's Formula book. The book says: [This book contains a dizzying array of mathematical equations and formulae. Scrawled in the margin, however, is a single line: 'Only Gond's true name can destroy the Neurocitor.']The player character reacts based on if they know the Gnomish name of Gond "Nebelun".
PAD_ReadZannerBook.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -331; 6; -145Kill Zanner ToobinRead the book he has in his pocket.

AD_FrellCleaningUp.synopsis: Frell Olsin worriedly is cleaning up the bodies of his dead captors. He knows if he is cuaght he and his wife will be killed - if they're lucky. He is trying not to vomit at the sight of the blood, and is doing everything he can not to faint.

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter.synopsis: Baneite Tamia is verbally abusing Lowa before the workroom encounter. Lowa is exhasuting and near tears, and is just begging to sleep. Tamia is having none of it.
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ago to -267; 6; -148skip over the auto-started dialogwatch the characters speak the ADs on the other side of the room from a distance.

GondianWorker_PostIRN01.synopsis: One liner for GondianWorker_PostIRN01, who only comes on stage if at least 2 workroom gondians are dead when the player returns from the Iron Throne. This gondian has helped the player kill the banites and is now afraid of what the consequences will be. The Gondians thinks they never should have fought back.
GondianWorker_PostIRN01.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -267; 6; -148pick a fight with the people in the room and kill everyoneopen debugbook and set all prisoners to savedWatch the confrontation dialogkillcombat in the fight that startsclick on GondianWorker_PostIRN01

BaneiteOfficer03.synopsis: One liner for BaneiteOfficer03 in the workroom. He is a quiet, stern and devout follower of Bane, the god of Tyranny.
BaneiteOfficer03.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen Recon, and turn on Roll Amazingteleport to -269; 6; -149, and a dialog will auto-startChose the deception option in the dialogAfter succeeding, the dialog should soon endwalk up to and click on S_LOW_BaneiteOfficer03

BaneiteOfficer17.synopsis: One-liner dialog with Baneite Officer 17, available if the player resolves the dead mans switch threat dialog without combat.
BaneiteOfficer17.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen Recon, and turn on Roll Amazingteleport to -269; 6; -149, and a dialog will auto-startChose the deception option in the dialogAfter succeeding, the dialog should soon endwalk up to and click on S_LOW_BaneiteOfficer17_f6614259-eec4-4c38-b87b-cf5c806be6fd

AD_LabLevelWarningPlaque.synopsis: Plaque in the security office, leading to the Lab level
AD_LabLevelWarningPlaque.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ago to -324; 5; -149Click on Lab Level Warning Plaque

BaneiteOfficer02.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen Recon, and turn on Roll Amazingteleport to -269; 6; -149, and a dialog will auto-startChose the deception option in the dialogAfter succeeding, the dialog should soon endwalk up to and click on S_LOW_BaneiteOfficer02_de084b09-99c6-426e-9159-f692d180d418 to initiate this dialog.

AD_LowaWorkingHard.synopsis: Lowa works with gritted teeth after being fully intimidated.

WorkroomEncounter.synopsis: The player is caught walking around the workroom by some baneites. The player can try to act like they are baneites, or rile up the Gondians into a rebellion. High tension, high stakes situation.
WorkroomEncounter.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -267; 6; -148Approach the center of the room.After LOW_SteelWatchFoundry_DeadMansSwitchThreat finishes, continue towards the center of the room.The dialog should start when you are spotted by the characters.

Confrontation_AfterIRN.synopsis: This dialog plays if the player solves the Iron Throne before ever seeing the LOW_SteelWatchFoundry_DeadMansSwitchThreat dialog.After destroying the Iron Throne the player walks in Baneites tormenting Gondian Workers in the Foundry Work room.With the Iron Throne gone, the dead mans switch no longer works.
Confrontation_AfterIRN.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ause the debugbook>Set quest flags & options > Act3(LOW/END) > LOW - Steel Watch Foundry > choose any optiongo to -267; 6; -148

GondianWorker_PostIRN02.synopsis: One liner for GondianWorker_PostIRN02, who only comes on stage if at least 2 workroom gondians are dead when the player returns from the Iron Throne.
GondianWorker_PostIRN02.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -267; 6; -148pick a fight with the people in the room and kill everyoneopen debugbook and set all prisoners to savedWatch the confrontation dialogkillcombat in the fight that startsclick on GondianWorker_PostIRN02

AD_BeforeConfrontation.synopsis: Toobin is desperately stalling for time as the Baineites are getting ready to kill the Gondians.
AD_BeforeConfrontation.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen debug book and set all IRN prisoners to savedgo to -267; 6; -148watch the ADs play out in front of you.

AD_ToobinWorries.synopsis: After the player promises to help the gondians, Toobin says worried ADs to himself during his idle.
AD_ToobinWorries.how_to_trigger: behaviour AD for Toobin while he is waiting for the player to explore floor 2

GondianWorker01_AfterIRN.synopsis: A Post-Iron Throne dialog for Lowa, the Gondian worker in the Steel Watch Foundry.
GondianWorker01_AfterIRN.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ause the debugbook>Set quest flags & options > Act3(LOW/END) > LOW - Steel Watch Foundry > choose any optionGo to -267; 6; -148Go through the dialog, and when done with the following fight, talk to S_LOW_GondianWorker01_92010ea3-cd5e-4896-97fc-1f1e7942fcf5

AD_FrellWorkingHard.synopsis: Frell Olsin works on the steel watch. Something has broken and he is terrified he's going to get in trouble.

GondianWorker01.synopsis: An attempt to talk to a gondian worker. The player may recieve information about the kidnapped families in the iron throne.

SwitchWarningCombatInterrupt.synopsis: The Gondian worker spots that one of the kill switches got dropped and she freaks out.
SwitchWarningCombatInterrupt.how_to_trigger: Go to -271; 8; -147 in CTY_Main_A and trigger the dialog, and choose to fight the guards. In the fight kill S_LOW_BaneiteOfficer02_de084b09-99c6-426e-9159-f692d180d418. She willd drop the dead man's switch, and initiate this dialog.

AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters.synopsis: Toobin thinks out loud as he works in the security office. He's been tasked with updating the Steel Watcher's design, and locked in this room after his eyes were cut out. He's refused to give in to despair, however, and very much takes the NASA approach of 'work the problem'.
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReCon and use "oe low_Foundry_FundangoFollower"Go to -1982; -1; 420pbserve the AD play

ScryScreen2_0.speaker: Narrator
ScryScreen2_0.text: *Scared and miserable with visible cuts and bruises, these people can only be one thing - prisoners.*
ScryScreen2_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: |A group of scared looking people huddle together against a cold prison wall, that they are clearly chained to. The seem dirty, exhausted and miserable.|

PAD_ReadGondBook_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadGondBook_0.text: There it is. Gond's true name: Nebelun.

GondianWorker02_0.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_0.text: It's too late - they're gonna kill us all. The Overseers, the Motivators - we're all dead.

GondianWorker02_1.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_1.text: Breathe, you're a Gondian - just disarm the collars. But what if I make a mistake? What if set it off? What if - oh god.
GondianWorker02_1.context: NodeContext: frustrated, scared, talking to self, panicking

GondianWorker02_2.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_2.text: I'm sorry, I'm a good Gondian. I'm sorry!
GondianWorker02_2.context: NodeContext: full on freak out, panicking, upset (talking to himself, maybe hands in hair and freaking out

GondianWorker02_4.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_4.text: Nothing is wrong, Overseer. I - I have everything under control.
GondianWorker02_4.context: NodeContext: terrified out of his mind (he's broken something) maybe a low bow, grovelling, scared for his life

GondianWorker02_6.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_6.text: What have I done? They'll kill my wife because of this. You! You made me do this!
GondianWorker02_6.context: NodeContext: full on freak out, panicking, upset

GondianWorker02_7.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_7.text: The Iron Throne is no more? Gond, let my wife be safe. I'll do anything, just let her be all right.
GondianWorker02_7.context: NodeContext: trying not to freak out, terrified for his wife

GondianWorker02_8.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_8.text: Thank you for letting me work on the Steel Watch. I am very lucky to be part of this.
GondianWorker02_8.context: NodeContext: terrified out of his mind, maybe a low bow, grovelling, scared for his life

GondianWorker02_9.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
GondianWorker02_9.text: I want my house, and my cat, and my wife. I want this all to go away.
GondianWorker02_9.context: NodeContext: eyes close, thinking of wife, scared

AD_DrooCleaningUp_0.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
AD_DrooCleaningUp_0.text: I need to get rid of these bodies - right now.

AD_DrooCleaningUp_2.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
AD_DrooCleaningUp_2.text: So much blood - and the smell.

DeadMansSwitchThreat_11.speaker: Gondian Lowa
DeadMansSwitchThreat_11.text: You are asking the impossible! Gyronetics require a steady hand and a sharp gaze - I can barely keep my eyes open. I need to rest.
DeadMansSwitchThreat_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: She gestures to her right, where she is working on a steel watcherNodeContext: near tears, exhausted and frustration.

DeadMansSwitchThreat_1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
DeadMansSwitchThreat_1.text: You have a son, do you not? Is he as lazy and pathetic as his spineless mother?
DeadMansSwitchThreat_1.context: NodeContext: cold, cruel - looking down at the gnome before her like she is nothing but dirt on her shoe

DeadMansSwitchThreat_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The crystal rises, hover above her palm. It is green in colour.

DeadMansSwitchThreat_10.speaker: Gondian Lowa
DeadMansSwitchThreat_10.text: Wait - stay your hand! I beg you!
DeadMansSwitchThreat_10.context: NodeContext: panicked - the overseer has a device which can kill her son, and all her fellow gondian's families

DeadMansSwitchThreat_5.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_KillSwitches
DeadMansSwitchThreat_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: crystal goes from green to red (or any colour, just something to show a 'change')NodeContext: voice comes from the crystal

DeadMansSwitchThreat_9.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
DeadMansSwitchThreat_9.text: Tell me, Gondian. Tell me about your son.
DeadMansSwitchThreat_9.context: NodeContext: cruel smile - she's enjoying tormenting the gnome

DeadMansSwitchThreat_13.speaker: Gondian Lowa
DeadMansSwitchThreat_13.text: He's not - yes, Overseer Holzt. He's frail in body and mind - like me, like all of us. Yet by your grace he lives.
DeadMansSwitchThreat_13.context: NodeContext: gritted teeth, fists clenched, utterly humiliated - knows if she doesn't disparage her son (the light of her life), the overseer will kill her son

DeadMansSwitchThreat_8.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
DeadMansSwitchThreat_8.context: NodeContext: rubbing salt in the wound (she killed lowa's wife)

DeadMansSwitchThreat_4.speaker: Gondian Lowa
DeadMansSwitchThreat_4.text: She is - was - useless, and interfered with production quotas. You were wise to remove her from this world.
DeadMansSwitchThreat_4.context: NodeContext: every word costs lowa everything. Her heart is breaking all over again, grief and rage threatening to spill out as she looks at her wife's killer - yet she knows she can't give in, or her son will die

DeadMansSwitchThreat_12.speaker: Gondian Lowa
DeadMansSwitchThreat_12.text: Forgive my outburst - I will work through the night. This Watcher will be operational by dawn.
DeadMansSwitchThreat_12.context: NodeContext: defeated, utterly exhausted - all hope lost, head bent in subjugation

DeadMansSwitchThreat_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Crystal drops back into the over seer's palm palm. Changes from red to green. She drops her arm and puts the device 'away'.

DeadMansSwitchThreat_2.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
DeadMansSwitchThreat_2.text: I will allow it. But if your work is anything short of impeccable, your son will die screaming. Is that clear?

DeadMansSwitchThreat_7.speaker: Gondian Lowa
DeadMansSwitchThreat_7.context: NodeContext: defeated, utterly exhausted - all hope lost, head bent in subjugation

AD_ChattingBaneites_0.speaker: Iron Consul Chadd
AD_ChattingBaneites_0.text: I crossed the line between domination and pacification. I failed the Black Hand.

AD_ChattingBaneites_3.speaker: Fist of Bane Gasper Throaks
AD_ChattingBaneites_3.text: Your dedication to Bane's tenets is admirable, Dread Brother.

AD_ChattingBaneites_2.speaker: Iron Consul Chadd
AD_ChattingBaneites_2.text: It is not enough. I fear what Lord Gortash will say.

AD_ChattingBaneites_1.speaker: Fist of Bane Gasper Throaks
AD_ChattingBaneites_1.text: Lord Gortash is blessed as unholy Bane's favoured. His judgement is final.
AD_ChattingBaneites_1.context: NodeContext: resigned, knows his fellow banite will likely be killed

AD_ChattingBaneites_6.speaker: Iron Consul Chadd
AD_ChattingBaneites_6.text: I know - I am grateful for my service to Lord Gortash.
AD_ChattingBaneites_6.context: NodeContext: knows he will likely be killed, cold and accepting

AD_ChattingBaneites_8.speaker: Fist of Bane Gasper Throaks
AD_ChattingBaneites_8.text: I heard you were disciplined by Overseer Holzt, Dread Brother.

AD_ChattingBaneites_7.speaker: Iron Consul Chadd
AD_ChattingBaneites_7.text: When instructing a Gondian, my enthusiasm overtook me - I cut off her hand.

AD_ChattingBaneites_5.speaker: Fist of Bane Gasper Throaks
AD_ChattingBaneites_5.text: Clumsy - what good are they without their limbs?

AD_ChattingBaneites_4.speaker: Iron Consul Chadd
AD_ChattingBaneites_4.text: Indeed - I had to dispose of her.

AD_DrooWorkingHard_0.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
AD_DrooWorkingHard_0.context: NodeContext: nodding off at his work bench

AD_DrooWorkingHard_1.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
AD_DrooWorkingHard_1.context: NodeContext: startled awake, furious with himself, maybe slaps himself

AD_DrooWorkingHard_2.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
AD_DrooWorkingHard_2.text: Stay awake, just - just stay awake.
AD_DrooWorkingHard_2.context: NodeContext: falling asleep on his feet

AD_LowaCleaningUp_0.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_LowaCleaningUp_0.text: If I hide the corpses, the smell will attract someone. I need to dispose of them.

AD_LowaCleaningUp_1.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_LowaCleaningUp_1.text: I could cut them up - or perhaps incinerate them?

AD_LowaCleaningUp_2.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_LowaCleaningUp_2.text: One problem at a time - deal with the bodies.

AD_LowaCleaningUp_3.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_LowaCleaningUp_3.text: What if I get caught? No - we're not thinking like that.

GondianWorker03_0.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_0.text: Burn this place to the ground - and the Banites with it.

GondianWorker03_2.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_2.text: I thought the Overseers were invincible - but you killed him. Just like that!

GondianWorker03_4.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_4.text: The Oveerseers are going to burn us alive for this. Our families. EVERYONE!
GondianWorker03_4.context: NodeContext: panicking, angry, gesturing to the dead bodies around him

GondianWorker03_5.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_5.text: Toobin is the only reason any of us are still breathing. He didn't deserve to die like that. No one does.
GondianWorker03_5.context: NodeContext: grieving - toobin was his hero

GondianWorker03_10.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_10.text: But if he was here, he'd ask for help. He'd ask you to stop the Banites, their collars, their Watchers - end it all. Please.
GondianWorker03_10.context: NodeContext: scared, trying to be brave

GondianWorker03_6.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_6.text: Overseer Holzt will cut my tongue out if she discovers I fell asleep. Don't tell her, please.
GondianWorker03_6.context: NodeContext: terrified out of his mind, maybe a low bow, grovelling, scared for his life

GondianWorker03_7.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_7.text: Gond, forgive me - I'm awake. I'm sorry! I'm so sorry!
GondianWorker03_7.context: NodeContext: nodding off, exhausted out of his mind at the beginning of the line - shoots wide awake, terrified at seeing the player (who he thinks is one of his captors)

GondianWorker03_8.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_8.text: You want to help? Then get the hells out of here before you make everything worse!

GondianWorker03_9.speaker: Gondian Droo Falbo
GondianWorker03_9.text: Toobin thinks you can do it, that you're the one who will save us all - which means I do too.

PAD_ReadZannerBook_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadZannerBook_0.text: We already know the true name of Gond: Nebelun.

PAD_ReadZannerBook_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadZannerBook_1.text: The true name of Gond? I don't know it, but somebody in this place must.

AD_FrellCleaningUp_1.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
AD_FrellCleaningUp_1.text: I helped kill an Overseer. I'm dead, I'm so dead.

AD_FrellCleaningUp_2.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
AD_FrellCleaningUp_2.text: Gond help me, there's so much blood.

AD_FrellCleaningUp_3.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
AD_FrellCleaningUp_3.text: Breathe - you have to clean up. You have to get rid of the bodies.

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_5.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_5.text: Thank you for your mercy, Overseer.

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_3.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_3.text: Be careful of that shaking hand, Gondian. I will not tolerate mistakes.

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_8.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_8.text: I'm glad the matter has been settled, Gondian.
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_8.context: NodeContext: cold, formal - looking down at the gondian before her

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_4.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_4.text: But it will not happen again. Clear?
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_4.context: NodeContext: cold, formal - notes of a threat

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_11.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_11.text: You forget yourself, Gondian. Your quota is now doubled.

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_1.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_1.text: Are you out of your mind? You can't snap your fingers and expect the impossible!
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_1.context: NodeContext: near tears, exhaustion and frustration

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_9.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_9.text: Please - I'm so tired. If I could sleep, just for a little while, I could finish this Watcher.
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_9.context: NodeContext: near tears, exhaustion and frustration

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_15.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_15.text: Your output is pathetic, Gondian. Explain yourself.
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_15.context: NodeContext: cold, formal - looking down at the gondian before her

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_7.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_7.context: NodeContext: exhausted, irritable, trying and failing to be submissive

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_6.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_6.text: 'Trying' isn't an explanation. Why are the gyronetics incomplete?

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_0.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_0.text: Because my eyes burn from lack of sleep!

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_12.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_12.text: You asked for an explanation, and I gave you one.
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_12.context: NodeContext: near tears, exhaustion and frustration

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_17.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_17.text: Don't make me triple your quota, Gondian. Back to work.

AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_16.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_BeforeWorkroomEncounter_16.context: NodeContext: near tears, exhaustion and frustration

GondianWorker_PostIRN01_0.speaker: Gondian Lilly Tilly
GondianWorker_PostIRN01_0.text: Gods, the Overseers will kill us - if these collars don't get us first.

GondianWorker_PostIRN01_1.speaker: Gondian Lilly Tilly
GondianWorker_PostIRN01_1.text: Go away - you, the Banites, everyone.

GondianWorker_PostIRN01_2.speaker: Gondian Lilly Tilly
GondianWorker_PostIRN01_2.text: So what if the Iron Throne is gone? Nothing changes - we're still stuck here. Still bound to these damn collars.

GondianWorker_PostIRN01_3.speaker: Gondian Lilly Tilly
GondianWorker_PostIRN01_3.text: They're going to kill us for fighting back, you understand? We're dead.

GondianWorker_PostIRN01_4.speaker: Gondian Lilly Tilly
GondianWorker_PostIRN01_4.text: I don't know who was the bigger fool - you or Toobin! We never should have fought back.

BaneiteOfficer17_0.speaker: Fist of Bane Bagdog
BaneiteOfficer17_0.text: You are fortunate to be here, Dread One. The joy of seeing a completed Watcher pacify the masses is unmatched.

BaneiteOfficer17_1.speaker: Fist of Bane Bagdog
BaneiteOfficer17_1.text: Keep thine eyes watchful - the Gondians slack in their work at every opportunity.

AD_LabLevelWarningPlaque_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_LabLevelWarningPlaque_0.text: *RESTRICTED AREA - Entrance only with Lord Gortash's permission. Violators will be executed.*

BaneiteOfficer02_0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
BaneiteOfficer02_0.text: I must keep my eyes on the Gondians - even a broken horse can still kick.

BaneiteOfficer02_7.speaker: Player
BaneiteOfficer02_7.text: Do you know where the prison is?

BaneiteOfficer02_4.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
BaneiteOfficer02_4.text: Of course not. You know our lord maintains a strict need to know protocol.

BaneiteOfficer02_12.speaker: Player
BaneiteOfficer02_12.text: You mentioned the Gondian's wife? What's the story?

BaneiteOfficer02_5.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
BaneiteOfficer02_5.text: There remained a spark of resistance. I made an example of her. The son is sufficient leverage. They took him to the prison.

BaneiteOfficer02_8.speaker: Player
BaneiteOfficer02_8.text: What do you make of the Motivators?

BaneiteOfficer02_14.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
BaneiteOfficer02_14.text: I love them. The esteemed Prinski is a genius. He deserved to be so well rewarded by our lord. It's a superb domination device.

BaneiteOfficer02_1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
BaneiteOfficer02_1.text: All it takes is one - and you can kill every Gondian wearing a collar. It is almost too easy.

BaneiteOfficer02_13.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
BaneiteOfficer02_13.text: We caught a Gondian on the lower levels trying to smuggle a message out.

BaneiteOfficer02_6.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
BaneiteOfficer02_6.text: I had his husband beat him to death. To save the rest of his family. We've had no issues since.

AD_LowaWorkingHard_0.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_LowaWorkingHard_0.text: Focus - you can't make any mistakes.

AD_LowaWorkingHard_3.speaker: Gondian Lowa
AD_LowaWorkingHard_3.context: NodeContext: worried, part she's working on is fragile

WorkroomEncounter_24.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_24.text: Dread Brother - stand ready. Gondians - so much as twitch, and I'll rip your tongues out myself.
WorkroomEncounter_24.context: NodeContext: she hears a noise (the player has just arrived, turns to face the player. Cold, cruel and calm. She doesn't know who they are, yet she is prepared to strike them down

WorkroomEncounter_25.speaker: Narrator
WorkroomEncounter_25.text: *You recognise the Overseer's uniform. She's a follower of Bane - the god of tyranny.*

WorkroomEncounter_16.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_16.text: In the presence of company, it is rude not to announce yourself, dear visitor. I neither know nor care how you got in here - but you shall not leave.
WorkroomEncounter_16.context: NodeContext: speaking to player, cruel smile

WorkroomEncounter_23.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_23.text: Forgive the interruption, Dread Sister. I've just arrived for duty.

WorkroomEncounter_37.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_37.text: The relief crew was due hours past. Your tardiness will be noted, Dread One.

WorkroomEncounter_21.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_21.text: Here - take this Motivator. Be careful - this one's trigger is sensitive. If you drop it, it's likely to incinerate them all.
WorkroomEncounter_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: generic handing motion to playerNodeContext: generic handing motion to player. Pride as she discusses the cruel device

WorkroomEncounter_38.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_38.text: I hope Lord Gortash gives the signal soon. I'm getting tired of their whining.

WorkroomEncounter_26.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_26.text: You speak words of command, yet your voice quivers. You are no follower of the Black Hand.
WorkroomEncounter_26.context: NodeContext: cold, cruel smile as she catches the player - speaking to player

WorkroomEncounter_15.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_15.text: I wish to bathe in the blood of these worthless Banites. You can help, Gondians - or you can die.

WorkroomEncounter_17.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_17.text: An interloper? How did you get in here?
WorkroomEncounter_17.context: NodeContext: as close to shocked as a banite gets  - speaking to player, angry that the player managed to get into the steel foundry - somewhere that is  supposed to impenetrable

WorkroomEncounter_6.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_6.text: It matters not - you revealed yourself for nothing. The Gondians wouldn't know a spine if I ripped it from their backs and beat them with it.
WorkroomEncounter_6.context: NodeContext: dismissive wave of her hand, speaking about the gondians as if they weren't right next to her

WorkroomEncounter_18.speaker: Gondian Lowa
WorkroomEncounter_18.text: You're wrong. Even if we beg, even if we humiliate ourselves, it won't matter. You'll kill us all anyway.
WorkroomEncounter_18.context: NodeContext: this is the moment - curles fist, realising the only way she'll survive is if she fights back. Speaking almost to herself.

WorkroomEncounter_36.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_36.context: NodeContext: surprise, shock that the gondian would dare speak back - said to lowa

WorkroomEncounter_13.speaker: Gondian Lowa
WorkroomEncounter_13.text: I said - we shall bow no more! For the glory of Gond!
WorkroomEncounter_13.context: NodeContext: raises her fist in the air, yelling a battle cry for her fellow gondians to attack - and take back their freedom

WorkroomEncounter_34.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_34.text: Gondians, cut out the interloper's eyes.
WorkroomEncounter_34.context: NodeContext: dismissive wave of the hand towards the player, like they were turd they found on the floor. Speaks to Lowa in the second line

WorkroomEncounter_3.speaker: Gondian Lowa
WorkroomEncounter_3.text: Overseer, please - we are engineers, not killers...
WorkroomEncounter_3.context: NodeContext: Overseer has just asked her to cut out someone's eyes. Scared, horrified

WorkroomEncounter_5.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_5.text: What happens to the disobedient, slave?

WorkroomEncounter_1.speaker: Gondian Lowa
WorkroomEncounter_1.text: ...I will do it, Overseer. Forgive me.
WorkroomEncounter_1.context: NodeContext: first line to guard, second line looking at player. Heartbroken, about to attack player.

WorkroomEncounter_33.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_33.text: Gondians! Fight back! Do not let these people torment you.

WorkroomEncounter_31.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_31.text: COWARDLY GONDIANS - FIGHT BACK! FIGHT WITH ME!

WorkroomEncounter_28.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_28.text: I am here to help, Gondians. Together, we can free you all.

WorkroomEncounter_4.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_4.text: I am here to help, Gondians. Together, we can free you all.

WorkroomEncounter_10.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_10.text: A proposal, Gondians. You hold these arseholes, and I stab them all to death?

WorkroomEncounter_11.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_11.text: I've heard many a tale of Gondian genius and courage. Let us write another today - and take down your captors.

WorkroomEncounter_22.speaker: Player
WorkroomEncounter_22.text: Touch these people, and I'll kill you.

WorkroomEncounter_35.speaker: Black Gauntlet Tamia Holzt
WorkroomEncounter_35.text: An interloper? You shouldn't be here - heads will roll for allowing you to pass.
WorkroomEncounter_35.context: NodeContext: as close to shocked as a banite gets  - speaking to player, angry that the player managed to get into the steel foundry - somewhere that is  supposed to impenetrable

Confrontation_AfterIRN_1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
Confrontation_AfterIRN_1.text: You have beaten and tormented us to the brink of insanity. You cut out my eyes. But we will bow no more.
Confrontation_AfterIRN_1.context: NodeContext: this is his big revolution moment, he's furious and done bowing down

Confrontation_AfterIRN_0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
Confrontation_AfterIRN_0.text: Gondians! Rip the Motivator from this bastard's hands. FOR GOND!
Confrontation_AfterIRN_0.context: NodeContext: this is his big revolution moment, he's furious and done bowing down. Roaring triumphantly

GondianWorker_PostIRN02_0.speaker: Gondian Pippin Bow
GondianWorker_PostIRN02_0.text: They said the Iron Throne was impenetrable - and you proved them wrong. Together, we can beat these bastards!

GondianWorker_PostIRN02_3.speaker: Gondian Pippin Bow
GondianWorker_PostIRN02_3.text: What do we do? If - if we leave our collars will trigger. But if we go downstairs... the Banites will kill us.

GondianWorker_PostIRN02_4.speaker: Gondian Pippin Bow
GondianWorker_PostIRN02_4.text: I knew it - I knew someone would come for us. Whatever you need, we've got your back.

GondianWorker_PostIRN02_5.speaker: Gondian Pippin Bow
GondianWorker_PostIRN02_5.text: You've got more courage than half this city combined.

AD_BeforeConfrontation_0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
AD_BeforeConfrontation_0.text: We have your designs. We have your methods. We have no more use for you.

AD_BeforeConfrontation_7.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_BeforeConfrontation_7.text: We are the greatest engineers in the realm - you need us to maintain the Steel Watch!
AD_BeforeConfrontation_7.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians

AD_BeforeConfrontation_1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
AD_BeforeConfrontation_1.text: Beg and scream all you wish. You will die today.

AD_BeforeConfrontation_6.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_BeforeConfrontation_6.text: I have an idea - for a new Watcher. One that could flatten the city with a single swing!
AD_BeforeConfrontation_6.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians

AD_BeforeConfrontation_2.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
AD_BeforeConfrontation_2.text: You are in no position to negotiate, Gondian.

AD_BeforeConfrontation_4.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_BeforeConfrontation_4.text: But look at all these unfinished Watchers. You need us!
AD_BeforeConfrontation_4.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians

AD_BeforeConfrontation_3.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
AD_BeforeConfrontation_3.text: Convenient that you mention this only when you are about to die.

AD_BeforeConfrontation_5.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_BeforeConfrontation_5.text: Spare us, and I will begin prototyping the new Watcher. Immediately!
AD_BeforeConfrontation_5.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians

AD_ToobinWorries_0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinWorries_0.text: Is this too big a risk? What if we are caught? No - there is no other way.
AD_ToobinWorries_0.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm

AD_ToobinWorries_1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinWorries_1.text: Obelia - I would do anything to hug you again.
AD_ToobinWorries_1.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm

AD_ToobinWorries_2.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinWorries_2.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm

AD_ToobinWorries_3.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_ToobinWorries_3.text: Help is coming, Obelia - just hold on.
AD_ToobinWorries_3.context: NodeContext: worried, trying to be calm

GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_0.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_0.text: My son, oh, my sweet boy...

GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_1.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_1.text: It doesn't matter how far I run, all it takes is one Motivator and I'm dead. Damn these collars!

GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_2.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_2.text: What are we going to do? The others are still downstairs - they'll be killed!

GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_3.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_3.text: I want this madness to end, I want to go home. Please make it stop.

GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_4.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_4.text: The Gondians stand with you, my friend.

GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_5.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_AfterIRN_5.text: The city lauded the Steel Watch, happily turning a blind eye to our plight. They left us to rot - everyone except you. Thank you.

AD_FrellWorkingHard_0.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
AD_FrellWorkingHard_0.context: NodeContext: terrified and panicked - knows he's going to get in trouble

AD_FrellWorkingHard_1.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
AD_FrellWorkingHard_1.text: What am I going to do?
AD_FrellWorkingHard_1.context: NodeContext: terrified and panicked - knows he's going to get in trouble

AD_FrellWorkingHard_3.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
AD_FrellWorkingHard_3.text: Breathe, you can fix this. Just fix it, you stupid oaf.
AD_FrellWorkingHard_3.context: NodeContext: terrified and panicked - knows he's going to get in trouble, angry at himself

GondianWorker01_4.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_4.text: I just want my son to be safe. That's it. Please - don't let him die. Don't let any of them die.

GondianWorker01_5.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_5.text: Blessed be, what have we done?

GondianWorker01_3.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_3.context: NodeContext: panicked and afraid (player will think she's talking about the dead guards, she's actually thinking of her family)

GondianWorker01_1.speaker: Player
GondianWorker01_1.text: Yes, killing your captors was the point of this.

GondianWorker01_0.speaker: Player
GondianWorker01_0.text: Relax - they can't hurt you anymore.

GondianWorker01_6.speaker: Player
GondianWorker01_6.text: Congratulations - how does it feel to have a spine?

GondianWorker01_2.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_2.text: Like I am about to projectile vomit.

GondianWorker01_12.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_12.text: The Overseers hold more than our lives hostage - they have our families.

GondianWorker01_13.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_13.text: And if they see what we've done, killing me will only be the beginning. Gond, help us.

GondianWorker01_7.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_7.text: By Gond's hammer, I'll have this done in record time - I swear it.

GondianWorker01_9.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_9.text: I have to clean up the bodies - I have to hide this!

GondianWorker01_10.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_10.text: Is everything - forgive me. The gyronetics will be done shortly, you have my word.

GondianWorker01_11.speaker: Gondian Lowa
GondianWorker01_11.text: I'm sorry - I didn't want to attack you, none of us did. But this is a disaster.

SwitchWarningCombatInterrupt_1.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_SteelWatchFoundry_WorkroomGondians
SwitchWarningCombatInterrupt_1.text: No! The Motivator - deactivate it, hurry!

AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_0.text: Perhaps if I adjusted the Watcher's rotary...
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_0.context: NodeContext: quietly musing to himself as he works

AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_1.text: But then optical targeting would need rebalancing. Blast this can of worms.
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_1.context: NodeContext: quietly musing, frustrated at the end

AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_2.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_2.text: Hmm. That could work... or cause massive destabilisation.

AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_3.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_3.text: Perhaps if I ripped out the hydraulics? Started fresh?
AD_GondianWorker08_WorkMutters_3.context: NodeContext: quietly musing to himself as he works
